posts.postText:
To report an exploited part of a map (Getting outside the map, parts where you're not supposed to be, etc), follow this format:

 Map Name :
 Description of spot (Optional) :
 Direct Link to Screenshot of Area :

The screenshot does not have to be taken in TTT.
<3 your auto slay on peaches very comical

Map: de_vegas

Description: On the roof of the entire map near the helipad, players are able to jump outside the map and get to a point where they cannot be killed by anyone still remaining in the map. An innocent camping there can effectively win for his fellow inno's by making a sandwich while staring at the floor.

No screenshot, but the description should help.
on the not realistic version of peaches castle (the usual one) there is a back area that you can get to behind the fountain with hands. It's no bueno.

Kariko Village
